title: Bernstein on Beethoven: a tribute
creator_credit: Humphrey Burton, Amberson Productions and CBS
brief_description: Leonard Bernstein traces the life of Beethoven and plays sections from the “Piano Concerto No.1 in C Major” in a musical celebration of Beethoven’s Bicentennary at the Vienna Festival of Music. Suitable for Upper Secondary level students.
